> [!Note]
> **This package is currently under development and is not for production use.**

The goal of glyvis is to visualize everything in the `glycoverse` ecosystem.
Bioinformatics analysis results, glycan structures, glycan biosynthesis pathways, and more.
Just `autoplot()` it!

## Installation

You can install the development version of glyvis from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("glycoverse/glyvis")
```
